attributes.action: Allow girl to go to the toilet on their period in school
attributes.additional_details: So girls can clean themselves up during their period
attributes.background: Make a law that girls should be allowed to go to the bathroom during lessons and I charge the schools if this doesn’t happen

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Give students a legal right to access school toilets when they have their period:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637669
